consequences.text: Update a specific stat of the character.
Update the physical state of the character.
Update the mental state of the character.
Update the status description of the character.
Gain a new trait for the character.
Lose an existing trait from the character.
Gain a new piece of trivia for the character.
Lose an existing piece of trivia from the character.
Lose a trinket from the character.
Add new wound to the character.
Remove an existing wound from the character.
Update a part of the character's physical features.
Update a part of the character's clothing.
